title: Legacy
description: Jim Ford is a widower, turning to work where he used to turn to his wife and slave Colleen. Until one day his old friend Corbin calls and, with his wife and slave Belinda, charges into his life. The two need a huge favor from Jim, and in it, a huge gift for Jim ...  *** Contains graphic depictions of sex and BDSM activities for readers above the age of eighteen years. ***
author: Lucas X. Black
